title: Create GitHub Branch and PR
description: Create a new branch, update README, and open a pull request on GitHub
prompt: Create a new branch called hello-world in my angiejones/goose-demo repository. Update the README.md file to say "this was written by goose" and commit it. Open a pull request with your changes.
example:
This will:
- Create new branch 'hello-world'
- Update README.md content
- Commit changes
- Open pull request
author: GooseAI Team
